Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Square

  • class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Square class represent one space on the gameboard. It has two integers for it's owner and threat level and one boolean for printing graphics for player's YX coordinates. More higher the threat level is, more likely the CPU will claim this square. Owner of the square values are 0=empty 1=player=X 2=CPU=0

    • Field Summary

      if true [ ] is printed as selection marker
      private int owner
      Stores the owner of Square: 0=empty 1=X 2=O

      Stores the threat level of the Square
